name: Upbound Group
description: Upbound Group, Inc. (NASDAQ: UPBD) is a technology and data-driven leader in accessible and inclusive financial products serving underserved consumers. Formed in February 2023 when Rent-A-Center rebranded into a holding company, Upbound operates industry-leading brands including Rent-A-Center, Acima, Brigit, Get It Now, and Home Choice across more than 2,300 retail locations in the United States, Mexico, and Puerto Rico.
